import torch
from src.models.last_e import create_last_e_base, create_last_e_small, create_last_e_large

# Param counts
for name, fn in [\('small', create_last_e_small\), \('base', create_last_e_base\), \('large', create_last_e_large\)]:
    m = fn\(60\)
    p = sum\(x.numel\(\) for x in m.parameters\(\)\)
    print\(f'LAST-E-{name}: {p:,} params'\)

# Forward pass
m = create_last_e_base\(60\)
m.eval\(\)
data = {
    'joint':    torch.randn\(2, 3, 64, 25\),
    'velocity': torch.randn\(2, 3, 64, 25\),
    'bone':     torch.randn\(2, 3, 64, 25\),
}
with torch.no_grad\(\):
    out = m\(data\)
print\(f'Output: {out.shape}'\)
assert out.shape == \(2, 60\)
print\('All verification checks passed!'\)
" 2>&1)
